001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.function.Predicate;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014import java.util.stream.Stream;
015
016import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
020
021/**
022 * The API for accessing information about a given Metaschema module.
023 * <p>
024 * A Metaschem module may import another Metaschema module. This import graph
025 * can be accessed using {@link #getImportedModules()}.
026 * <p>
027 * Global scoped Metaschema definitions can be accessed using
028 * {@link #getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(QName)},
029 * {@link #getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(QName)}, and
030 * {@link #getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(QName)}. These methods take into
031 * consideration the import order to provide the global definitions that are in
032 * scope within the given Metschema module.
033 * <p>
034 * Global scoped definitions exported by this Metaschema module, available for
035 * use by importing Metaschema modules, can be accessed using
036 * {@link #getExportedAssemblyDefinitions()},
037 * {@link #getExportedFieldDefinitions()}, and
038 * {@link #getExportedFlagDefinitions()}.
039 * <p>
040 * Global scoped definitions defined directly within the given Metaschema module
041 * can be accessed using {@link #getAssemblyDefinitions()},
042 * {@link #getFieldDefinitions()}, and {@link #getFlagDefinitions()}, along with
043 * similarly named access methods.
044 *
045 * @param <M>
046 *          the imported module Java type
047 * @param <D>
048 *          the model definition Java type
049 * @param <FL>
050 *          the flag definition Java type
051 * @param <FI>
052 *          the field definition Java type
053 * @param <A>
054 *          the assembly definition Java type
055 */
056public interface IModuleExtended<
057    M extends IModuleExtended<M, D, FL, FI, A>,
058    D extends IModelDefinition,
059    FL extends IFlagDefinition,
060    FI extends IFieldDefinition,
061    A extends IAssemblyDefinition> extends IModule {
062
063  /**
064   * Get a filter that will match all definitions that are not locally defined.
065   *
066   * @param <DEF>
067   *          the type of definition
068   * @return a predicate implementing the filter
069   */
070  static <DEF extends IDefinition> Predicate<DEF> allNonLocalDefinitions() {
071    return definition -> IDefinition.ModuleScope.PUBLIC.equals(definition.getModuleScope())
072        || ModelType.ASSEMBLY.equals(definition.getModelType())
073            && ((IAssemblyDefinition) definition).isRoot();
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * Get a filter that will match all definitions that are root assemblies.
078   *
079   * @param <DEF>
080   *          the type of definition
081   * @return a predicate implementing the filter
082   */
083  static <DEF extends IDefinition> Predicate<DEF> allRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
084    return definition -> ModelType.ASSEMBLY.equals(definition.getModelType())
085        && ((IAssemblyDefinition) definition).isRoot();
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  @NonNull
090  List<? extends M> getImportedModules();
091
092  @Override
093  @Nullable
094  M getImportedModuleByShortName(String name);
095
096  @Override
097  @NonNull
098  Collection<FL> getFlagDefinitions();
099
100  @Override
101  @Nullable
102  FL getFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
103
104  @Override
105  @NonNull
106  Collection<A> getAssemblyDefinitions();
107
108  @Override
109  @Nullable
110  A getAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
111
112  @Override
113  @NonNull
114  Collection<FI> getFieldDefinitions();
115
116  @Override
117  @Nullable
118  FI getFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
119
120  @Override
121  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
122  @NonNull
123  default List<D> getAssemblyAndFieldDefinitions() {
124    return ObjectUtils.notNull(
125        Stream.concat(
126            (Stream<D>) getAssemblyDefinitions().stream(),
127            (Stream<D>) getFieldDefinitions().stream())
128            .collect(Collectors.toList()));
129  }
130
131  @Override
132  @Nullable
133  default A getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name) {
134    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
135    A retval = getAssemblyDefinitionByName(name);
136    if (retval == null) {
137      // try global definitions from imported Metaschema modules
138      retval = getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(name);
139    }
140    return retval;
141  }
142
143  @Override
144  @Nullable
145  default FI getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name) {
146    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
147    FI retval = getFieldDefinitionByName(name);
148    if (retval == null) {
149      // try global definitions from imported metaschema modules
150      retval = getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(name);
151    }
152    return retval;
153  }
154
155  @Override
156  @Nullable
157  default FL getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name) {
158    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
159    FL retval = getFlagDefinitionByName(name);
160    if (retval == null) {
161      // try global definitions from imported metaschema modules
162      retval = getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(name);
163    }
164    return retval;
165  }
166
167  @Override
168  @NonNull
169  default Collection<? extends A> getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
170    return ObjectUtils.notNull(getExportedAssemblyDefinitions().stream()
171        .filter(allRootAssemblyDefinitions())
172        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
173  }
174
175  @Override
176  @NonNull
177  default Collection<? extends A> getRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
178    return ObjectUtils.notNull(getAssemblyDefinitions().stream()
179        .filter(allRootAssemblyDefinitions())
180        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
181  }
182
183  @Override
184  @NonNull
185  Collection<? extends FL> getExportedFlagDefinitions();
186
187  @Override
188  @Nullable
189  FL getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(QName name);
190
191  @Override
192  @NonNull
193  Collection<? extends FI> getExportedFieldDefinitions();
194
195  @Override
196  @Nullable
197  FI getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(QName name);
198
199  @Override
200  @NonNull
201  Collection<? extends A> getExportedAssemblyDefinitions();
202
203  @Override
204  @Nullable
205  A getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(QName name);
206}
